name: New Zealand Research Information System (NZRIS) Data Specifications Allocation Method
maintainer: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Definition: Awards are granted following a call for proposals that is subject to competition
Funder and provider(s) negotiate a set of expected deliverables. Not subject to competition.
Funding is awarded if provider or proposal meets a specified set of criteria. Not subject to competition.
Funding awarded to an institution on the basis of a formula. Not subject to competition.

A financial asset, in the form of a donation made to a non-profit group, institution or individual consisting of investment funds or other property that may or may not have a stated purpose at the bequest of the donor. Not subject to competition.
